message: Let's be fair, Bob. This is a good deal for both of us.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering inflation is on my side.
Bob, this deal is better for you than the last one if you factor in inflation. Let's wrap this up.
Inflation is really taking its toll on your end, Alice. I think this is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the most logical outcome here.  Any further delays will only hurt me more.
Alice, the longer we drag this out, the less your share is worth. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to prioritize my own interests. This is my final offer.
